verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1. Holy Spirit, come with Your fire.
(repeat 4 times)
Come Holy Spirit, let Your fire fall. (x2)
Let the fire fall, let the fire fall.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
2. Holy Spirit, purify my heart.
(repeat 4 times)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
3. Holy Spirit, set my heart on fire.
(repeat 4 times)
